We were given a huge grant from the USDA and have money to spend on ads and marketing and want someone experienced to guide us. We want someone who can create a plan of attack so every each year we have marketing channels to get people interested and qualified for the incubator program. Qual é o trabalho?Montagem de lista de contatos de colaboradores das áreas do Marketing / Comunicação / Comercial / Sócios e/ou Proprietários de Faculdades localizadas em RECIFE, BELÉM, GOIÂNIA, RIO DE JANEIRO, BELO HORIZONTE, PORTO ALEGRE, CURITIBA, JOINVILLE, RIBEIRÃO PRETO, SÃO PAULO (por importância).2. Como deve ser feito?Procurando os e-mails nos sites das empresas destes segmentos, ou acessando o LinkedIn das pessoas que trabalham nessas empresas, ou qualquer outro meio que ache pertinente.3. Quantidade300 empresas. Observação importante: cada empresa pode conter muitos e-mails, mas ainda assim continuará contando como 1 empresa.4. desc: We need 4 appointments that meet the following... The calls will target full time U.S. based health insurance brokers representing firms in the following categorieso < $10M revenueo $10M-100Mo $100M-$500MAnd the companies that these brokers are typically insuring would have between 2-99 covered lives.  This information would need to be confirmed with the broker to be eligible for the appointment.  We would not be selling anything to them - rather, we would want to have an informational conversation that would last approximately 30 minutes.  In exchange for the health insurance broker's time, we would offer them $50 Amazon gift card.All appointments would need to be set between9am - 3pm EST Thursday, October 19th9am - noon EST Friday, October 20th4pm - 530pm EST and 7pm - 8pm EST Today, October 18th also availableTo be paid for the project, freelancer must schedule appointments within these times and communicate contact information to me as I will be sending a Conference Call Dial-in Number to the contact for the telephone call.  The following information is required:Broker name, company name, size in revenue, email, telephone, and any other pertinent information.  If the contact does not participate in the appointment as scheduled, then Freelancer will be asked to replace the appointment prior to getting paid.  We recommend over-scheduling to guard against this and ensure a faster payment.  So, since we are looking for 4 appointments, you may want to schedule 5 or 6 to make sure we end with 4 live appointments.The project may lead to additional / similar projects if a successful working relationship.  Look forward to hearing from you soon.
title: Cold Call Appointment Setting for Marketing Research Firm
